explains: v. 广播（broadcast 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: television broadcasting 电视广播；电视播送
british broadcasting corporation 英国广播公司（BBC）
broadcasting right 广播权；转播权

sentences.en: Will new technology change the shape of broadcasting?
sentences.cn: 新技术会改变广播的方式吗？

sentences.en: It is to start broadcasting no later than the end of 1994.
sentences.cn: 开始广播不会晚于1994年底。

sentences.en: There are only a limited number of broadcasting frequencies.
sentences.cn: 只有数量有限的广播频率。
